Module org.cojen.tupl
Package org.cojen.tupl.repl

Interface DatabaseReplicator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, ReplicationManager, Replicator
    public interface DatabaseReplicator
extends Replicator, ReplicationManager
    Implementation of a ReplicationManager for supporting full database replication. Applications shouldn't interact with a DatabaseReplicator instance directly — only the database instance is permitted to interact with it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.cojen.tupl.ext.ReplicationManager

        ReplicationManager.Accessor, ReplicationManager.Writer

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static DatabaseReplicator open​(ReplicatorConfig config)
      Open a replicator instance, creating it if necessary.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

      • Methods inherited from interface org.cojen.tupl.ext.ReplicationManager

        checkpointed, control, encoding, notifyDrop, notifyRename, read, readPosition, ready, restoreRequest, start, sync, syncConfirm, syncConfirm, writer

      • Methods inherited from interface org.cojen.tupl.repl.Replicator

        connect, getLocalAddress, getLocalMemberId, getLocalRole, socketAcceptor, sync

    • Method Detail

      • open

        static DatabaseReplicator open​(ReplicatorConfig config)
                        throws IOException
        Open a replicator instance, creating it if necessary. Pass the instance to the DatabaseConfig object before opening the database.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if misconfigured
        IOException
